projects.Title: Sun Tracking Solar Panel
projects.Description: Developed a Python-based solar panel tracking system using LDR sensors and servo motors, improving energy efficiency by 25%

projects.Title: Design and Analysis of a Terahertz Antenna
projects.Description: A 2.8 THz metamaterial antenna was simulated for bio-sensing, revealing Germanium as the optimal substrate to evaluate return loss

projects.Title: Convert Black and White image to colour image
projects.Description: Convert a grayscale image to color by using KNN to predict pixel colors based on nearby color image patches. Use OpenCV

projects.Title: Self-Activating Weather Control Fan
projects.Description: Reduced temperature control latency by 20% using DHT11 and Embedded C

projects.Title: Portfolio
projects.Description: A responsive portfolio using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to showcase projects, skills, and experience with interactive UI components
